summary:
Changes the texture of Alduin, Paarthurnax, fire, blood, frost, ancient, and elder dragons to the more common technicolored dragons as seen in meta such as Pern, Inheritance/Eragon (Saphira, Glaedr, Thorn, etc) Dungeons and Dragons and countless other games.
Alduin is now much darker, Paarthurnax is white, fire dragons are red...
descriptionHtml:
[center]This mod changes the texture of Alduin, Paarthurnax, fire, blood, frost, ancient, and elder dragons to the more common technicolored dragons as seen in meta such as Pern, Inheritance (Saphira, Glaedr, Thorn, etc) and DND.
[b]
Alduin is now much darker, Paarthurnax is white, fire dragons are red, blood dragons are green, frost dragons are blue, elder dragons are gold, and ancient dragons are black (though not as black as Alduin).[/b]
They may look slightly different depending on the ENB you use, if any. Feel free to submit screenshots!
Currently there are three texure sizes: 1k/2k/4k.
[b]
Known bugs 1.0:[/b]
There is a singular black spike on Paarthurnax's chin (pictured)
The Ancient dragons have the golden maws and eyes of Elder dragons and are tinted with a slight bronze, while their texture is meant to be black all-around with icy eyes[/center]
author: aviform
